entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
